Q_DESC: A programming language very similar to C called language  M was developed for Defence department. The language has a large set of built in functions for every encryption method. For security reasons language M, does not few operators in C like <<,>>,pointers and % operators. Develop a C code to get remainder of division  operation without using Modulus (%) operator.                  Input:                                           First line : N: No of test case   0<N<=100.                                             Second line:D  Dividend                   0<D<=5000                                Third line : R Divisor 25
